Text: Its a pity Shelby Foote didnt do the narration. He has such a great southern voice.

Thank you for this mammoth masterpiece!! And for being very generous by putting a lot of work 
in providing this quality release. And who said the Green Skull stands for nothing :)
A sincerely appreciated effort.

I disagree Bynx.  I started listening to this audiobook in Shelby Foote's own voice a few years ago.  I couldn't listen to more than a half hour.  His southern drawl is very hard to understand, in my Yankee opinion.  :)

thnx a bunch ramjam could u plz upload Steven Pressfield audiobooks , its historical fiction esp Gates of Fire is about the Spartans and the battle at Thermopylae. It is taught at U.S. Military Academy
Thank you very much. I appreciate the hard work. It is nice to have a good copy of this (to replace the one you mentioned) along with the maps.
